title: From ‘moving’ corpse & corruption scandal to quick ‘suicide’ story: 5 glaring questions in gun death of Putin minister
content: Putin is 'shocked' at the death. THE death of Vladimir Putin's transport minister has raised a series of awkward questions for the dictator. Roman Starovoit, 53, was sacked by Vlad on Monday after he couldn't stop Ukraine causing mayhem to Russia's aviation i…
